error.signature: Cannot destructure property 'X' of useContext(...) as it is null/undefined

verdict.summary: useContext returns default (undefined/null) because component isn't wrapped in Provider.

dead_ends.action: Provide a default value in createContext that mimics the real value
dead_ends.why_fails: Default values mask the missing Provider — bugs appear silently

dead_ends.action: Use optional chaining on every context property
dead_ends.why_fails: Verbose and hides the real issue — missing Provider

workarounds.action: Ensure the component is a child of the Context.Provider in the tree
Create a custom hook that throws if used outside Provider
